explanation: [0-0] In a room, a girl wearing denim overalls and a checkered shirt is standing in front of a whiteboard with the letter "A" written on it. The girl is holding a wooden stick in her hand, and there is a pink curtain on the right.

[0-2] First, the girl in overalls looks to the left and points the wooden stick in her hand at the letter "A" on the whiteboard. The scene switches to a man wearing a pink shirt and a red scarf around his neck. He is sitting in front of a wooden table with a drink in his hand. The background is a red and blue wall, with a little greenery on the right. He reaches out his left index finger and points forward. The scene cuts back to the girl in overalls, who looks to the left, opens her mouth to say something, and shakes her head. The scene cuts back to the man in pink, who points his finger forward and opens his mouth to say something.
